title: Fire Department Vehicle Font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141101163043im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5527.jpg)

I have been trying to find this font... it is reminiscent of a school's varsity font, but it's not quite Rockwell.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141101163043/http:/typophile.com/files/font_362.jpg) | 159.67 KB |
author: tungwill

comments.content:
I suspect that this is lettering, perhaps based on a template, rather than a font as such. You can come pretty close ot replicating the lettering by editing one of the college sport fonts.  
Don
